statements: SELECT * FROM shipping_info
SELECT order_id, recipient_name FROM shipping_info WHERE delivery_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT recipient_name, delivery_address FROM shipping_info WHERE order_id = 1001
SELECT * FROM shipping_info ORDER BY delivery_date DESC
SELECT order_id, delivery_address, delivery_date FROM shipping_info WHERE recipient_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT * FROM shipping_info WHERE delivery_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT delivery_address, recipient_name FROM shipping_info WHERE recipient_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT delivery_address, delivery_date FROM shipping_info WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT recipient_name, delivery_date FROM shipping_info WHERE delivery_address = '123 Main St' ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM shipping_info WHERE recipient_name = 'Alice' AND delivery_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM shipping_info WHERE order_id = 12345
SELECT shipping_address FROM shipping_info WHERE delivery_status = 'in-transit'
SELECT * FROM delivery_info WHERE delivery_status = 'delivered'
SELECT driver_name, vehicle_type FROM delivery_info WHERE delivery_id = 54321
SELECT COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM shipping_info
SELECT * FROM shipping_info WHERE delivery_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT order_id, shipping_address FROM shipping_info ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT delivery_id, driver_name, vehicle_type FROM delivery_info WHERE delivery_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY delivery_id ASC;
SELECT shipping_address, delivery_status FROM shipping_info WHERE order_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM shipping_info JOIN delivery_info ON shipping_info.order_id = delivery_info.delivery_id;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM Orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_amount >100
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT o.order_id, c.first_name, c.last_name, s.address FROM Orders o JOIN Customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN ShippingInfo s ON o.order_id = s.order_id
SELECT * FROM ShippingAddresses;
SELECT order_id, street_address, city FROM ShippingAddresses WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT address_id, state, zip_code FROM ShippingAddresses ORDER BY address_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM OrderStatus WHERE status = 'Delivered';
SELECT agent_name, phone_number FROM DeliveryAgents WHERE agent_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ShippingAddresses WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT order_id, city, zip_code FROM ShippingAddresses WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY zip_code DESC;
SELECT agent_name, phone_number FROM DeliveryAgents ORDER BY agent_id ASC;
SELECT DeliveryTrack.order_id, agent_name, status FROM DeliveryTrack INNER JOIN DeliveryAgents ON DeliveryTrack.agent_id = DeliveryAgents.agent_id;
SELECT order_id, status, update_time FROM OrderStatus WHERE status = 'Delivered';
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2005;
SELECT provider_name, contact_email FROM shipping_providers;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, order_date, shipping_address FROM orders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number, shipping_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY stock_quantity ASC;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, contact_email, phone_number FROM shipping_providers WHERE provider_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT status_id, status_name FROM shipping_statuses WHERE status_name LIKE '%shipped%';
